subtitle: years ago when I began giving my classes
so the core group of people from the
Arts and entertainment industry and I
felt I was at a disadvantage because I
before I even opened my mouth they may
be looking at me like one of those
stereotypes I decided to try and
experiment I did not use any religious
terms I turned it into a completely
secular conversation instead of God I
used words like higher reality the
essence of it all if it was a
particularly New Age crowd I would say
things like undefined states of higher
awareness if it was a Torah I would use
the word blueprint or road map a few
weeks pass one guy remember he was from
Jay and the Americans it was a rock band
in the 60s comes over to me and says to
me you've been talking about these
fascinating things we're all loving it
but tell me are you talking about God
and I I laughed and I said yes push
don't tell anyone don't spoil it for the
others
